document.docAuthor: El-Hawagry, Magdi S. & Al Dhafer, Hathal M.
document.masterDocTitle: The family Bombyliidae in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia (Diptera: Brachycera: Asiloidea)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The family Bombyliidae in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia (Diptera: Brachycera: Asiloidea)

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Villa
Lioy, 1864 : 732
. Type species:
Anthrax concinna Meigen, 1820
, by subsequent designation of
Coquillett, 1910 : 619
.

subSubSection.paragraph: Hosts: Noctuidae and Lycaenidae [ Lepidoptera ], Tabanidae [ Diptera ], Tenebrionidae [ Coleoptera ] and Myrmeliontidae [ Neuroptera ] ( Hull 1973 ; Yeates & Greathead 1997 ).

Villa bivirgata Austen, 1937
( Fig. 17 )

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Villa bivirgata
Austen, 1937 : 137
. Type locality: Israel .

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution: AF: Saudi Arabia [as “South western part”], Yemen . PA: Egypt , Israel , Saudi Arabia , Syria .

Saudi Arabian localities:
Al-Baha : Jabal Shada Al A’Ala Protected Area (Al-Mekhwa Gov.)
.
Asir : Raydah Protected Area (Abha Gov.)
. Riyadh : Riyadh City ( Riyadh Gov.).
Dates of collection: April to June.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Anthrax cana
Meigen, 1804 : 201
. Type locality: France .

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution: AF: Saudi Arabia [as “South western part”]. PA: Afghanistan , Algeria , Armenia , Austria , Azerbaijan , Bulgaria , Croatia , Czech Republic , Egypt , France (incl. Corsica ), Greece , Gruzia , Iran , Italy (incl. Sicily ), Kazakhstan , Libya , Macedonia , Malta , Moldova , Romania , Russia , Slovenia , Spain , Switzerland , Tajikistan , Tunisia , Turkey , Turkmenistan , Ukraine , former Yugoslavia .
Saudi Arabian localities: Al-Baha : Ghabet Raghdan ( Al-Baha Gov.).
Dates of collection: May.

bibRefCitation.author: Greathead, D. J.
bibRefCitation.refString: Greathead, D. J. (1967) The Bombyliidae (Diptera) of northern Ethiopia. Journal of Natural History, 1, 195 - 284. https: // doi. org / 10.1080 / 00222936700770211

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Villa galla
Greathead, 1967 : 255
. Type locality: Ethiopia .

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution: AF: Chad , Eritrea , Ethiopia , Kenya , Niger , Saudi Arabia [as “South western part”].
Saudi Arabian localities: Asir : Fayfa (Fayfa Gov.). Makkah : Taief escarpment (Taief Gov.).
Dates of collection: September to November.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Anthrax micrargyra
Walker, 1871 : 262
. Type locality: Egypt ( Cairo ).

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution: AF: Saudi Arabia [as “South western part”]. PA: Egypt , Saudi Arabia .
Saudi Arabian localities: Makkah : Taief escarpment (Taief Gov.). Riyadh : Rawdhat Khorim (Rimah Gov.).
Dates of collection: April and November.

Villa paniscoides Bezzi, 1912
( Fig. 18 )

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Villa paniscoides
Bezzi, 1912 : 624
. Type locality: Malawi .

subSubSection.paragraph:
Hosts: Pupae of
Spodoptera exempta (Walker)
( Lepidoptera : Noctuidae ) ( Yeates & Greathead 1997 ).
Distribution: AF: Egypt [as ”Gebel Elba”], Eritrea , Ethiopia , Kenya , Malawi , Oman , Saudi Arabia [as “South western part”], Somalia , Uganda , Yemen .
Saudi Arabian localities: Al-Baha : Jabal El-Baher ( Al-Baha Gov.).
Dates of collection: June to November.

bibRefCitation.author: Greathead, D. J.
bibRefCitation.refString: Greathead, D. J. (1967) The Bombyliidae (Diptera) of northern Ethiopia. Journal of Natural History, 1, 195 - 284. https: // doi. org / 10.1080 / 00222936700770211

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Villa venus
Greathead, 1967 : 256
. Type locality: Eritrea .

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution: AF: Eritrea , Nigeria , Saudi Arabia [as “South western part”].
Saudi Arabian localities: Makkah : Taief escarpment (Taief Gov.).
Dates of collection: April.
